title.v: Sao chép số liệu năm trước

command.text:
create table #dept(ma_bp varchar(16)) if @@admin <> 1 insert into #dept select ma_bp from hrbp where (ma_bp in (select a.ma_bp from hrbp a, @@sysDatabaseName..hrquyenbp b where dbo.ff_Inlist(a.bp_ref, b.r_access2) = 1 and b.user_id = @@userID)) and status = '1'
select ky, nam + 1 as nam, ma_bp, dateadd(year, 1, ngay_tu) as ngay_tu, dateadd(year, 1, ngay_den) as ngay_den into #t from hrky a where nam = @nam - 1 and (ma_bp in (select ma_bp from #dept) or @@admin = 1)
if @del = 1 delete hrky where nam = @nam and (ma_bp in (select ma_bp from #dept) or @@admin = 1) else begin if @type = 1 delete hrky from hrky a join #t b on a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky and a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp where (a.ma_bp in (select ma_bp from #dept) or @@admin = 1) else delete #t from #t a join hrky b on a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky and a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp where (a.ma_bp in (select ma_bp from #dept) or @@admin = 1) end if @@admin = 1 insert into #dept select ma_bp from hrbp insert into hrky (ky, nam, ma_bp, ngay_tu, ngay_den, so_ngay, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select ky, @nam, b.ma_bp, ngay_tu, ngay_den, 0, getdate(), getdate(), @@userID, @@userID from #dept a join #t b on a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp
drop table #t drop table #dept
